00010 #ifndef IMCOMMON_H
00011 #define IMCOMMON_H
00012 
00013 /*---------------
00014   Include files
00015  ---------------*/
00016 #include "aa/aaglobal.h"
00017 #include "qa/SwiDataTypes.h"
00018 
00019 /* Residual CRC value to compare against return value of crc_16_calc().
00020  * Use crc_16_calc() to calculate a 16 bit CRC, and append it to the buffer.
00021  * When crc_16_calc() is applied to the unchanged result, it returns CRC_16_OK.
00022  */
00023 #define CRC_16_OK  0xE2F0
00024 
00025 /* Mask for CRC-16 polynomial:
00026  *
00027  *      x^16 + x^12 + x^5 + 1
00028  *
00029  * This is more commonly referred to as CCITT-16.
00030  * Note:  the x^16 tap is left off, it's implicit.
00031  */
00032 #define CRC_16_POLYNOMIAL 0x1021
00033 
00034 /* Seed value for CRC register.  The all ones seed is part of CCITT-16, as
00035  * well as allows detection of an entire data stream of zeroes.
00036  */
00037 #define CRC_16_SEED 0xFFFF
00038 
00039 /* Residual CRC value to compare against return value of a CRC_16_L_STEP().
00040  * Use CRC_16_L_STEP() to calculate a 16 bit CRC, complement the result,
00041  * and append it to the buffer.  When CRC_16_L_STEP() is applied to the
00042  * unchanged entire buffer, and complemented, it returns CRC_16_L_OK.
00043  * Crc_16_l_calc() of the same entire buffer returns CRC_16_L_OK.
00044  */
00045 #define CRC_16_L_OK 0x0F47
00046 /*
00047  * Mask for CRC-16 polynomial:
00048  *
00049  *     x^16 + x^15 + x^2 + 1
00050  *
00051  * Note:  the x^16 tap is left off, it's implicit.
00052  */
00053 #define CRC_16_L_POLYNOMIAL 0x8408
00054 
00055 /* 2^CRC_TAB_BITS */
00056 #define CRC_TAB_SIZE 256
00057 
00058 /*
00059  * Seed value for CRC register.  The all ones seed is part of CCITT-16, as
00060  * well as allows detection of an entire data stream of zeroes.
00061  */
00062 #define CRC_16_L_SEED 0xFFFF
00063 /*---------------
00064   Prototypes
00065  ---------------*/
00066 
00067 /* imcalculate16CRC */
00068 swi_uint16 imCalculate16CRC(
00069     swi_uint8  *dataBuf,
00070     swi_uint32 length );
00071 
00072 #endif /* IMCOMMON_H */
